Entry.Value: <I=G=MBDEVICE>: Open/close iDroid
<I=G=PAD_R3> Hold: Buddy Link
<I=G=UI_KEY_PARTY>: Scoreboard
<I=G=PAUSE>: Party Menu
<I=G=PAUSE> Hold: System Menu
Regarding the iDroid

Once a class is selected for a character, this cannot be undone. However, as you progress through the game, you will unlock alternate character slots allowing you to try out different classes.
Now, let's choose your class.

The INFILTRATOR class specializes in CQC with its fast movement speed, but is also very vulnerable with its lack of health.
This class is ideal for advanced players who know how to sneak behind enemies.

The ENFORCER class carries heavy explosives with high durability, but lacks movement speed and reflexes.
This class is ideal for average players.

The SCOUT class offers standard combat abilities while specializing in aiding their teammates with long range reconnaissance actions.
This class is ideal for beginners.

Each playable character represents a class.
Our 3 classes, SCOUT, ENFORCER, and INFILTRATOR each provide a unique gameplay style along with different loadouts.

Your first character slot is linked to the avatar from MGSV:TPP single player.
You can only edit this avatar's facial features in MGSV:TPP single player.

In order to start playing MGO, you must create a character.
Let's start your character creation.
Let's Create your Character.

Up to 12 players multiplayer matches in diverse locations and missions from MGSV:TPP.
Collect weapons and abilities that are unique to MGO. Strategize with your teammates to achieve victory!

Up to 16 players multiplayer matches in diverse locations and missions from MGSV:TPP.
Collect weapons and abilities that are unique to MGO. Strategize with your teammates to achieve victory!
METAL GEAR ONLINE (MGO) is the multiplayer component of METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN (MGSV:TPP).
Welcome to METAL GEAR ONLINE!

You have completed the tutorial.
The game will begin in the FREEPLAY environment. You can familiarize yourself with the controls before joining a match. Use the firing targets to practice your aim!

In the CUSTOMIZE option, you can customize your character's weapons, abilities, and gear.
Once you're up to a certain level, you will be able to customize your loadout within this menu.
In order to level up, join a match and start gaining experience points!

In the CREATE MATCH option, you can select your desired mission and map.
You can create up to 5 missions in a playlist that can be repeated.
Certain network connections will not allow you to use this feature.
In the SELECT MATCH option, you can select the desired match from the list of missions that are available.

In the AUTOMATCH option, you can choose a mission you would like to play and the system will automatically join you in a match. You can gain Gear Points at a higher rate than with other matching options.

In order to join an online match, open the iDroid and choose MATCHING.
There are 3 options within MATCHING: AUTOMATCH, CREATE MATCH, and SELECT MATCH.

Your character has been created, and you are ready to start playing MGO!
Before that, let's go over the essentials of your iDroid menu.

TIPS can be viewed in the SYSTEM MENU or the loading screen.
You will now begin playing MGO. Aim towards the enemy!
To the Battlefield!

You can access information regarding MB Coins through the VAULT menu.
Your MB Coins are shared between MGSV:TPP single player.

Personal stats and global ranking can be accessed in the STATS options from your iDroid.
The STATS options can be accessed from both FREEPLAY and during a mission.

Customizing your gear is a way to make your character look unique. Gear is entirely cosmetic, without any ties to your abilities, so don't worry about your performance and get your fancy hats on!
You can purchase special gear with your MB Coins or Gear Points, which can be obtained by completing missions.
Would you like to select this class?
<I=G=CALL>: Shortcut Preset Radio
Exit Tutorial
Suspending the tutorial for now.
Your character creation has failed.
You have already created a character. This will complete your tutorial.
<I=G=PAUSE>: MGO Party Menu

In the SURVIVAL option, you can play in the SURVIVAL game mode.
SURVIVAL is a mode in which teams of 6 players compete to gain as many consecutive wins as possible to achieve a high reward. You will receive a special reward for winning 5 consecutive matches, so do your best and aim for a 5-win streak!

In SURVIVAL, you can play the new EXPANSION PACK maps even if you haven't purchased the EXPANSION PACK. However, one SURVIVAL TICKET will be depleted each time you play SURVIVAL, and you will no longer be able to play SURVIVAL when you run out of tickets.
Your SURVIVAL TICKETS will be replenished periodically. Also, purchasing the EXPANSION PACK will grant you an unlimited number of SURVIVAL TICKETS.
